p: The second reason for rejection was that our conclusions might not be applicable to other classes of parasites. Rereading the manuscript it was clear our choice of words overstated the generality of our results, and we are now much more careful with our prose. We also discuss the extent to which our conclusions may be extrapolated to other viruses and pathogens by a more detailed review of the literature. All work on model organisms aims to shed light on biology more broadly, but whether it succeeds ultimately awaits research on other species.
